text: Motion
Motion
Motion

────...
You bought it with so much excitement, the star.

A secret base...
is incomplete without it, they say...

Yeah...
it's nice when it brings joy.

Like, "With this symbol, the secret base is complete!"
...something like that!

Oh...!
That's the feeling!

...But you know, we can only use the secret
base for a little while longer.
The live is coming up soon.

After the festival ends...
we won't be able to use it anymore...

─No good, it's tough to stay silent.
Got nothing to talk about, huh?
...By the way, what's the best tasting meal in the dorm?

Uh... that's a tough one...
I... like curry... and hamburgers...
Omurice...

Wow, that sounds great...!
I want to try stew too.
Everything...
Well, you can't have them all at once, right!?

If we all ask together...
or...
Right! We could just call them over!

After we finish all the preparations for the live, the five of us
can have dinner with Producer-san!

Then we won't have to worry even if there are lots of options
on the menu! ...and it'll feel like we're all united together!
I'll let it slide that your hunger is clearly the priority here.
